1. Press green START button; SIMON will give the first signal.

 2. Repeat the signal by pressing the same button.

 3. SIMON will duplicate the first signal and will add one.

 4. Repeat these two signals by pressing the same buttons.

 5. SIMON will duplicate these first two signals and add one.

 6. Continue in this manner as long as you can repeat each se-quence of signals correctly

NOTE: This game is just like the original SIMON except the user puts in the sequence backwards. 1. Press green START button; SIMON will give the first signal.

 2. Repeat the signal by pressing the same button.

 3. SIMON will duplicate the first signal and will add one.

 4. Repeat these two signals by pressing the same buttons in reverse order.

 5. SIMON will duplicate the first two signals and add one.

 6. Continue in this manner as long as you can repeat each se-quence of signals BACKWARDS correctly
